message.body: Hunter, I hear you had quite the horrible hunt a few weeks ago... Man, I'm sorry!

Well it all worked out in the end. I just felt bad that the little doe had to suffer so long. It's something I'd like to do maybe once a year to have some non industrial meat, but I definitely prefer fishing

I hear ya man, how long did she live after the gut shot? Got a decent doe this weekend, but I've wounded and lost 2 in the last year. Bad feeling. I've started doing neck shots. So far so good. She dropped like a stone on the corn and bled out in less than a minute
